trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValueEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded" /> event or <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed" /> 事件或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this delegate to implement virtual mode in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此委托用于实现中的虚拟模式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event to store updates and new entries in a data store object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件将更新和新条目存储在数据存储对象。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>参考主题。
